name: Bash-histories
body: ## Help us with our project by providing us with your bash history ### Why do we want these files? This data gathering is part of a software engineering research project that I am working on with Earl. We would like to carry out some analysis on your bash_histories to evaluate users' usage of the command line. If you have any more questions then please feel free to contact us - the details are below under "Contact Us". ## Instructions If you cannot view hidden files on your machine then please follow the instructions below to upload your .bash_history file. Otherwise you can directly use this uploader - Open a command line terminal window. - Run this command to copy your .bash_history file to your Desktop and make it visible.: ``` $ cp ~/.bash_history ~/Desktop/bash_history ``` - Use this uploader to upload your file*. - Run this command to remove it from your Desktop: ``` $ rm ~/Desktop/.bash_history ``` *Please note: this uploader was created using Google App Script hence will require your permission. ## Alternative Methods If you prefer not to use the automatic uploader, you can also email us your .bash_history file. Just follow the instruction in the "Contact Us" section, below. ## Contact Us For more information or questions please use the following contact details. Please use "BASH" in the subject header to ensure that your email gets through to us. - Dr Earl Barr: e.barr@ucl.ac.uk - Maithreyi Venkatesh: maithu@hotmail.co.uk
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
